attributes.action: Make government parties' propaganda illegal during a democratic vote.
attributes.additional_details: MP Sarah Wallaston (chairman of the Health Select Committee) swapped from the OUT campaign to the IN campaign when she heard that the OUT campaign said that they would 'free up £350M a week for the NHS'. She left on the bases that it "Simply isn't true."
attributes.background:
Recently the OUT campaign won the EU Referendum whilst advertising false information used to gain members on those specific points. 

For example, they stated that £350M was going into EU, when it wasn't. And if we left, it would go into the NHS. Which it won't.

Do what you say you'll do!
